description: This Dart source file defines the routing system for a Flutter app, including route constants, a router configuration, delegate, parser, and example screens. It manages navigation and page stack for a TV-friendly interface.

classes.name: AppRouterDelegate
classes.description: A custom router delegate managing the navigation stack for the TV app, handling route changes and building the Navigator widget.

classes.name: AppRouteInformationParser
classes.description: Parses route information into paths and restores route information from paths or URIs.

classes.name: AppNavigator
classes.description: A helper class to navigate programmatically without context by interacting with the delegate.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the details screen, displaying passed arguments.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A placeholder widget for the settings screen.

methods.name: buildRouter
methods.description: Constructs the RouterConfig with delegate and parser, setting initial route.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Handles incoming route configurations, updating the current path and args.

methods.name: _setPath
methods.description: Private method to update the current route path and arguments and notify listeners.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Programmatic navigation method to change route without build context.
